## Degrees2RadiansNode class

Converts degrees to radians

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class Degrees2RadiansNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Applies the formula: radians = degrees \* (Ï€ / 180) Supports scalar and vector inputs.
